sentences.en: At this latitude you often get strong winds.
sentences.cn: 在这一纬度地区经常有大风.

sentences.en: Don't make rigid restrictions; allow a certain latitude.
sentences.cn: 不要限得太死, 要有点灵活性.

sentences.en: Each point on Earth is specified by geographic latitude and longitude.
sentences.cn: 地球上每一点都可以用地理纬度和经度来确定.

sentences.en: He noted the latitude and longitude, then made a mark on the admiralty chart.
sentences.cn: 他记下纬度和经度，然后在航海图上做了个标记。

sentences.en: His status at the studio afforded him all the artistic latitude he could ask for.
sentences.cn: 他在创作室的地位让他可以在艺术上自由探索。

sentences.en: Mariners were also able to fix their latitude by using an instrument called astrolabe.
sentences.cn: 海员们还可使用星盘这种仪器确定纬度。

sentences.en: Our position is latitude 40 degrees north.
She was given considerable latitude in how she spent the money.
sentences.cn: 在如何花这笔钱的问题上她有很大的自由.

sentences.en: Spines - this expression has been used by various writers with considerable latitude.
sentences.cn: 刺,许多作者把这个词用在相当广泛的含义上.

sentences.en: Terrestrial latitude is measured in degrees north or south from the equator.
sentences.cn: 地球纬度是从赤道向南或向北以度数来表示.

sentences.en: The birds breed in northern latitudes.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟在北纬地区繁殖。

sentences.en: The greatest part of Europe is situated above the 45 th degree of Northern Latitude.
sentences.cn: 欧洲绝大部分地区位于北纬45度以北.

sentences.en: The latitude of the island is 20 degrees south.
The two cities are at approximately the same latitude.
sentences.cn: 这两个城市差不多位于同一纬度上.

sentences.en: This city is close to the fortieth parallel of north latitude.
We allow considerable latitude at these hearings.
sentences.cn: 我们在这种听证会上允许相当大的自由.

trans.tran_en: The latitude of a place is its distance from the equator.
